column2:
Spinnerette
(250 Health)(3 Mvmt)
2x2 Unit
2 Bonus Turns
Trample
Enrages when hit from behind, will also Web anything behind her when hit.

Each time she is Damaged she has a High Chance to spawn a Spiderling in an adjacent Tile.

Randomly goes off the board at the end of one of her turns.Won't return until you kill the Spider Kitten she spawns or she spawns 2 Spider Kittens.

Starts battle off the board, with a single Spider Kitten being the only unit present. Killing the Spider Kitten, spawns Spinnerette behind/next to the unit that killed the Spider Kitten.

Enraged: Gains +2 Mvmt. Doesn't move off board. Calms down at the end of her last turn next round.

column16:
Tormentor
Demon?
(380 Health)(? Mvmt)
1 Bonus Turn?
2x2 unit. Has 5 Candle Objects in it's boss arena. Each Candle Object has a symbol for a Status Effect above it.The same symbols for the status effects can also be found on certain body parts of the boss. (Perhaps they are associated with what moves the boss can use?) 

Has an enraged state. (May enter it after The Coven dies.?)

column4:
Web
Lobs Webs in an X Shape AOE(5 Tiles total), leaves Webs on the ground and inflicts Webbed to units hit, 5 Tile range.
column5:
Spawn Spiderlings
Lob 2 Spiderlings Randomly in an X shape AOE(5 Tiles total), 3 Tile range.
column6:

Only uses this Ability if off board.
Does this on her next turn after she goes off the board
Spawn a Spider Kitten on any open Tile.
column10:

5 Melee Damage, drains All? Mana, and applies -1 Int Down.
column17:
Open Maw?
Suck in units and objects in front of it. Then eat them? Can also eat the Candle Objects found in the arena.
column30:

Summon many Meaty Tentacles? around the map. (Not sure what they do.)
